attributes.action: Stop a second referendum on Brexit and accept brexit means withdrawal from EU!
attributes.additional_details:
they are asking for a second referendum which we don’t want we just want to get on with it. But I feel nothing being achieved by the conservatives since the electorates voted 2 and 1/2 years ago maybe longer and we’re still debating on a deal and no deal. The EU is a failing organisation and is trying to bring us down!
17.4 million people which is 52% voted to leave but we know it’s increased since then and yet the government still not doing anything they still want ties but we just want to leave.
attributes.background: We have noticed recently after the brexit referendum that remainers want to remain even though they left they are not respecting the will of the people.
